channel.title: 通知栏 on 个人主页

item.title: Android通知栏
item.description: 》 顺便推一下博客主页 前言 参考资料：google 通知栏Demo ##正文 demo 竟然没有要通知栏权限。 注册 1 private static final String ACTION_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION = 2 "com.android.example.notifyme.ACTION_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION"; 3 // Notification channel ID. 4 private static final String PRIMARY_CHANNEL_ID = 5 "primary_notification_channel"; 6 // Notification ID. 7 private static final int NOTIFICATION_ID = 0; 8 private NotificationManager mNotifyManager; 9 private NotificationReceiver mReceiver = new NotificationReceiver(); 10 11 mNotifyManager =(NotificationManager) getSystemService(NOTIFICATION_SERVICE); 12 13 // Notification channels are only available in OREO and higher.
